English: to be, there is, there are

Russian sentence: Это Тим, а это его жена.
English sentence: (This is Tim, and that is his wife.)
(What is your name? / How are you called?)
(The bus drove up to the restaurant.)
(I'm sorry, but I have to go.)
(The car is parked by the window.)

English: and, as for, but, (a particle used for emphasis)
that, than, in order that, so
one can, one may, it's possible
